author: aharon
title: ₳GOV: Agreements Building Platform
description: Decentralized decision making requires wide discussions, but platforms that are used by DAOs members are not suitable for this purpose.
solution: A decision-making tool that provides a way to create community-driven agreements by integrating continuous voting with discussion features.
experience: 10 years experience in decentralized governance. A team that build prototype of the app proposed, partnered with ADAgov - Funded F4, F5, F6
